column4: Hello, I'm in failsafe mode now. Everything's cool here. But if I try to go on normal GNOME session, I enter my login and password, it starts loading, then the screen goes black and throws me back into the login screen. How could I fix it? Thanks
that sounds like a tricky problem there...
any ideas how to solve it? :/
only thing i can think of is to reconfigure xorg.conf with sudo dpkg --reconfigure xserver-xorg, but i might be wrong...that's just all i can think of
